text.div:
Dengue Virus Infection (Tests for dengue virus IgG or Total Antibody [Qualitative])

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    16740-3 Dengue virus Ab [Presence] in Serum
    22250-5 Dengue virus 1 Ab [Presence] in Serum
    22251-3 Dengue virus 2 Ab [Presence] in Serum
    22252-1 Dengue virus 3 Ab [Presence] in Serum
    22253-9 Dengue virus 4 Ab [Presence] in Serum
    29661-6 Dengue virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    29676-4 Dengue virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum
    40748-6 Dengue virus Ab [Presence] in Serum by Hemagglutination inhibition
    7854-3 Dengue virus 1 Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    7856-8 Dengue virus 2 Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    7857-6 Dengue virus 3 Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    7858-4 Dengue virus 4 Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    86862-0 Dengue virus 4 neutralizing antibody [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Neutralization test
    86863-8 Dengue virus 3 neutralizing antibody [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Neutralization test
    86864-6 Dengue virus 2 neutralizing antibody [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Neutralization test
    86865-3 Dengue virus 1 neutralizing antibody [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Neutralization test
